parameters.name: TopDelta
parameters.description: Distance for the top surface delta, if appropriate

parameters.name: BottomDelta
parameters.description: Distance for the bottom surface delta, if appropriate

parameters.name: Part
parameters.description: Path and filename for the part used for the weld; this file is created and merged into your assembly

parameters.name: TopFaces
parameters.description: Array of faces from which to measure the top surface delta

parameters.name: StopFace
parameters.description: Array of faces that define the beginning and the end of the weld bead

parameters.name: ContactFaces
parameters.description: Array of faces that are joined by the weld bead
